T02TD2877E:218b-0: @218b // bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2877E:218b-1: dus gsum bde gshegs sku gsung sras bcas kyis //
T02TD2877E:218b-2: rjes gnang las kyi khro bor dbang bskur ba'i //
T02TD2877E:218b-3: khro bo'i rgyal po dug dgra dregs 'joms la //
T02TD2877E:218b-4: dang bas phyag 'tshal sgrub thabs go rims bri //
T02TD2877E:218b-5: grangs dang dus dang mtshan ma yi //
T02TD2877E:218b-6: bsnyen rdzogs dngos grub blang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2877E:218b-7: gnas dang phyogs dang sngon 'gro bya //
T02TD2877E:218b-8: thig gdab tshon dgye phyag mtshan dgod //
T02TD2877E:218b-9: khyad par rdzas bsog bum pa bca' //
T02TD2877E:218b-10: dngos grub rten dang mchod rdzas bsham //
T02TD2877E:218b-11: sdom bsrung smyung gnas chos gos brgyan //
T02TD2877E:218b-13: bskyed rim mchod pa bsnyen dus bzhin //
T02TD2877E:218b-14: bum nang lha bskyed spyan drangs mchod //
T02TD2877E:218b-15: dbang bskur byin rlabs bum nang thim //
T02TD2877E:218b-16: gzungs thag btags te rig sngags bzlas //
T02TD2877E:218b-17: steng dang 'og gi lam gnyis las //
T02TD2877E:218b-18: thun mong khyad par spro bsdu bya //
T02TD2877E:218b-19: khri phrag bdun du dngos grub blang //
T02TD2877E:218b-20: dbang bskur mchod bstod gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2877E:218b-21: bskyed bsdu spyod lam rnal 'byor bya //
T02TD2877E:218b-22: de rjes sgrub pa thon pa dang //
T02TD2877E:218b-24: sbyor ba bdun gsal las la sbyar //
T02TD2877E:218b-25: sgrub pa'i go rims slob dpon su w'a g'i shva ra k'i rtis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
